tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
My grandfather had a stroke. He is 88, and was high BP sufferer.
The Doctors treatment was so assuring that today my grand dad is back in action in less than 1 year walking, doing all his personal work by himself. The way he treats patience is commendable. Medicines might play a role, but the attitude of doctors matters so much and Dr,Muthukumar is a pure example of humanity!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Doctor is very personable and great listener . Obviously he is expert in his field looking forward to consult him with diagnostic report.
As ours was 1st visit, recommended by Mr.Srinivasan A501,Sidharth Upscale, MadanAnandapuram, he asked to get some tests done n get back to him
